title: Set up project folder structure and basic HTML/CSS
description: Create organized folder structure (src/components, src/engine, src/utils). Set up index.html, main.tsx, and basic global CSS.

title: Implement Fire button and turn management system
description: Create Fire button that triggers shot. Implement turn switching logic. Disable controls during shot animation. Handle turn indicators (whose turn it is).

title: Add Start button with transition from loading screen
description: Create prominent Start button component. Implement fade-in after loading animations complete. Wire up click handler to initialize game.

title: Initialize Node.js/React/TypeScript project with build tooling
description: Set up new project with package.json, install React, TypeScript, and build tools (Vite recommended). Configure TypeScript compiler options.

title: Implement physics engine for projectile trajectory
description: Create physics calculations for projectile motion. Use gravity constant (10 m/s²). Calculate trajectory based on angle, power, and time. Return position coordinates over time.

title: Implement loading screen with animations
description: Create delightful loading animations (CSS/canvas animations). Auto-play for a few seconds. Smooth transition effect when complete.

title: Implement terrain generation algorithm
description: Create algorithm to generate random terrain landscape. Use procedural generation (e.g., midpoint displacement or Perlin noise). Return array of height values across screen width.

title: Calibrate physics to screen size and add power scaling
description: Tune physics constants so full power at 70° goes left-to-right across screen. Scale based on canvas dimensions. Test and adjust initial velocity calculations.

title: Add rule: all changes must be tied to a bead
description: Update AGENTS.md and README.md to enforce that every change must be linked to a beads issue. This ensures traceability and proper workflow adherence.

title: Set up Canvas rendering infrastructure
description: Create Canvas component wrapper in React. Set up rendering context and frame loop. Handle window resizing and canvas scaling.

title: Create custom .beads/PRIME.md with branching workflow
description: Override default bd prime output with our custom workflow. Include branching requirements, feature branch workflow, quality gates, and session close protocol. This will be automatically shown to all agents at session start via Claude Code hooks.

title: Build angle selection UI with keyboard shortcuts
description: Create UI control for selecting cannon angle (0-90 degrees). Add keyboard shortcuts (arrow keys/number keys). Display current angle visually on tank.

title: Set up game state management system
description: Implement state management (React Context/Zustand/Redux). Track game phase (loading/playing/gameover), current turn, tank states, terrain data.

title: Build power selection UI with keyboard shortcuts
description: Create UI control for selecting shot power (0-100%). Add keyboard shortcuts. Display power meter/bar. Clean, intuitive design.

title: Implement projectile-tank hit detection
description: Detect when explosion radius overlaps with tank position. Check if any part of explosion touches tank hitbox. Return boolean hit result.

title: Create tank color selection screen
description: Add new game phase 'color_select' between loading and playing. Create UI screen where player chooses their tank color from available options (e.g., red, blue, green, yellow). Store selected color in game state. Transition to game initialization after selection.

title: Setup the basic project structure as simple single page application
description: Create a single page web application remake of Scorched Earth tank game using Node.js, React, and TypeScript. Features: loading animations, random terrain generation, turn-based gameplay with angle/power selection, physics-based projectile motion, collision detection, and win conditions.

title: Implement projectile-terrain collision detection
description: Detect when projectile intersects with terrain. Check projectile position against terrain height array. Return collision point coordinates.

title: Create Tank entity with rendering and positioning
description: Define Tank class/type with position, color, health. Implement tank rendering on canvas. Add logic to place tanks on terrain at left/right positions.

title: Clarify workflow rules and preserve remote branches
description: Update AGENTS.md and README.md to make workflow rules unmissable. Change workflow to NOT delete remote branches after merging - keep them for history/reference.

title: Implement game initialization sequence
description: After color selection, execute game start sequence: 1) Generate random terrain using existing algorithm, 2) Create player tank with selected color at left position, 3) Create opponent tank with contrasting color at right position, 4) Initialize turn state (player goes first), 5) Transition to 'playing' phase. Wire up the complete flow from color selection to gameplay.

title: Implement win condition and game over state
description: Display winner when tank is destroyed. Show game over screen with winner announcement. Add restart/play again button. Transition back to start state.

title: Create explosion animation effect
description: Implement small explosion animation at impact point. Use particles/canvas animation/sprite. Play on collision. Clean up after animation completes.

title: Implement projectile animation with dotted trace line
description: Animate projectile along calculated trajectory. Draw dotted line showing projectile path. Smooth frame-by-frame animation. Start from tank cannon position.
